message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be fair to propose a price of $14,000 for this valuable item.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $14,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value of the product and my position, I am willing to accept $13,000 for the product.
